name: Monster Dive
description:
Monster Dive is a very enjoyable game. Once you start, you won’t want to stop. Your mission is to save cute falling monster. You have to catch them into a box. Try it, and see how high you can score. Challenge your friends to beat your score.

Features:
- fun addictive gameplay
- simple and intuitive controls
- beautiful Retina display graphics
- Game Center integration (leaderboard)
- Universal (works on all devices)

Enjoy the game!
